ruleReason: Gently reprimands you if you write words which violate the rule 7 in the given channel

helpWithChannels.en-US: I will gently reprimand you if you write words which violate the rule 7 in $<channels>
helpWithChannels.fr: Je te réprimanderai gentiment si tu écris des mots qui violent la règle 7 dans $<channels>
helpWithChannels.pt-BR: Eu irei gentilmente te repreender se você escrever palavras que violem a regra 7 em $<channels>

helpWithoutChannels.en-US: I will gently reprimand you if you write words which violate the rule 7
helpWithoutChannels.fr: Je te réprimanderai gentiment si tu écris des mots qui violent la règle 7
helpWithoutChannels.pt-BR: Eu irei gentilmente te repreender se você escrever palavras que violem a regra 7
